"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54de2ff56368725141622400#post_54de2ff56368725141622400
Well during the editors have to make cuts. If a scene is obtrusive or doesn't add enough to the movie, it goes to the chopping block. If we didn't edit them, movies like Avengers would last like three hours.
